attributes.name: month
attributes.title: Month
attributes.description: Month of the calendar to render. The default will be the current month.

attributes.name: year
attributes.title: Year
attributes.description: Year of the calendar to render. The default will be the current year.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.title: Locale
attributes.description: Locale information for the calendar. This will include language, country, calendar type and numbering type. Defaults to browser locale.

attributes.name: weekdayFormat
attributes.title: Weekday format
attributes.description: The rendering style for the weekday labels. Values include short, long and narrow.

attributes.name: monthFormat
attributes.title: Month format
attributes.description: The rendering style for the month name. Values include short, long and narrow.

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The content of the calendar added to the beginning of the title container

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the calendar

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the calendar
